data.text:
@nzherald NZ how about a balanced transparent approach.?
1 No mandates
2 No vax passports
3 Free RAT tests
4 Work fm hm
5 Vit C, D3, NAC, etc.
6 Early treatments (Eg oral, iver, hydro, etc)
7 Vax those who want
8 FULLY informed consent
9 No Masks
10 No lockdowns
11 Open economy
12 Health.!
@rosey_nz @nzherald Or from many other viruses, illnesses...

@nzherald I wonder what's causing all this sudden rise in heart attacks, strokes & CVD in young healthy people ?

Must be a total mystery

Oh well

Dont forget to get boostered up 💉💉💉
Completely safe. Full data transparency 

Wouldn't want to get this oh so fatal cold going around https://t.co/qtq3qQ2qao
@rosey_nz @nzherald Except most people have been experiencing these systems for millennia.
@rosey_nz @nzherald 💯 correct I live by the motto if I wake up and feel good it's a great day, deal with things when the happen, why early about things that not happen yet
@rosey_nz @nzherald Because it is. They're covering it up. Poor test rats. 🤔

@nzherald "Don't trivialise getting it, you could have heart attacks or strokes in the future, or brain fog affecting your memory and thinking, or fatigue affecting your ability to work or take part in recreation."
Weird how these all sound just like the adverse reactions from the vax. 🤔
@nzherald Oh stop the fear mongering your articles do more damage to people's brains.
